#summary What is xeus about
= Introduction =

*xeus* is an instant messenger with [http://www.xmpp.org/ xmpp] protocol support.
In other words, it is a [http://www.jabber.org/ Jabber] client.
Its user interface is implemented in [http://wpf.netfx3.com/ Windows Presentation Foundation].
